meanings.definition: To take a photograph with a camera.
meanings.sent1: I snapshotted a picture of my dog at the park.
meanings.sent2: She always snapshotted beautiful sunsets on her phone.
meanings.sent3: He snapshotted his lunch before eating it, just for fun.
meanings.sent4: The photographer snapshotted the moment of pure joy on the child's face.
meanings.sent5: The tourist snapshotted the iconic landmark to remember the trip.

meanings.definition: A photograph taken with a camera.
meanings.sent1: I printed out the snapshotted of us from last summer.
meanings.sent2: The gallery displayed various snapshotted of nature scenes.
meanings.sent3: She kept a collection of snapshotted from her travels in a scrapbook.
meanings.sent4: The old album was filled with snapshotted of family gatherings.
meanings.sent5: The snapshotted captured the essence of the bustling city perfectly.
